subject: Meeting Tomorrow at 10AM
body: Dear Team, Please join our project status meeting tomorrow at 10AM. Regards, Manager

subject: Lunch this weekend?
body: Hey! Do you want to grab lunch this weekend? It's been forever since we caught up!

subject: Your Amazon Order #12345
body: Thank you for your order. Your package will arrive on Tuesday. Click here to track your shipment.

subject: Proposal for Project X
body: Please find attached our proposal for Project X. We look forward to your feedback. Best regards, Business Team

subject: Movie night!
body: Are you free Friday night? We're planning to watch that new movie we talked about!
